name: Calculation1
dax_expression: IF('Orders (Sample - Superstore (1))'[Category] = "Furniture", "furniture", IF('Orders (Sample - Superstore (1))'[Category] = "Office Supplies", "office supplier", IF('Orders (Sample - Superstore (1))'[Category] = "Technology", "technology", 'Orders (Sample - Superstore (1))'[Category])))
solution_explanation: Converts Tableau IF/ELSEIF CASE logic on Category into a DAX nested IF expression. Maps Furniture to furniture, Office Supplies to office supplier, Technology to technology, and returns the original Category if none match.
